name: MailBlocks
description: Build responsive email templates with MODX and ContentBlocks. This extra uses the MJML templating system: https://mjml.io and requires NodeJS to be installed on your server.
author: Hugo Peek

chunks.name: mbEmailSection
chunks.description: A layout segment for your email template. The columns are sized automatically, based on the amount of columns placed inside the section (the maximum amount being 4).

chunks.name: mbEmailText
chunks.description: Regular content copy, coming from a rich text field.

chunks.name: mbEmailButton
chunks.description: Links to places outside of the email. Can optionally contain a tracking URL.

chunks.name: mbEmailImage
chunks.description: An fixed width image, with a full URI to its source.

chunks.name: mbEmailIcon
chunks.description: An fixed width icon, with a full URI to its source.

chunks.name: mbEmailSocial
chunks.description: A row of social media icons. You can choose which channels to display (or hide).

chunks.name: mbEmailDivider
chunks.description: A horizontal line for dividing content inside a section.

plugins.name: mjmlToHTML
plugins.description: This plugin executes a shell command on your webserver that transforms the MJML syntax of your email into HTML. Requires NodeJS and MJML to be installed, and the PHP exec() function to be available.
